page.title: 03HOME FOR A CHRISTLETON GIRL
page.content: I live with my family in a large house in Christleton.My favourite room is our dining room,a real family room with our musical instruments in it.We have six recorders,flute,guitar,a violin and piano,which Charlotte ,my sister and I play.The nice thing about our house is the space.The hall is gigantic and all the rooms are big.In the front garden we have a pond overgrown with rushes and reeds. However it has an interesting variety of wildlife.There are goldfish, Palmate and common newts,frogs and toads and many other creatures including, pond skaters,water boatmen, great diving beetles,and water scorpions. I am very interested in Natural History and carry out my own research and investigations.I also belong to the School Wildlife Club and our Village Pond Conservation team.
